# IT proxy to comms apps

From [medium.com/@pentacent](https://medium.com/@pentacent/nginx-and-lets-encrypt-with-docker-in-less-than-5-minutes-b4b8a60d3a71#id_token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6Ijc4M2VjMDMxYzU5ZTExZjI1N2QwZWMxNTcxNGVmNjA3Y2U2YTJhNmYiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..MsZSMtoLcdxVrZuNpaMMI0rAwzKZyos7-Vfr5uCvx8b2pgytxkIJOxidT12YqZVZyWZmEMdA-ppMUJL39sMIQminWJuk44Td6MhnKGBxNHSD3HHz0fG9UWA1nm9gr1twwoM2AsF28zHi8lSXmotrZ4QxWAKr5EEDraIeuMUfgRqNT76A7N9MzMD961qcUKtl4BnL6qW8zsQRqkinlP_WP8tS51rFY7jMCtjBXtVXp6o3CdLSVN3EdxmSr46JXUQyWqGeajZgFhvZR_lmqWRAkRIAzANqm0Ssn56YI-UOL-FJzAAKThrSAH8japYFiDOqT47iVErnIVEyDNRhFbjIhg)

This projects also requests, renews and reloads Let's Encrypt certificates for the following domains
* rsa.dnxt.space
* jitsi.dnxt.space
* etherpad.dnxt.space
* mattermost.dnxt.space
* owncloud.dnxt.space

app.conf holds forwarding rules to Jitsi, etherpad, Mattermost and Owncloud.

init-letsencrypt.sh should be run to set up certbot
